name: ProgressView
desc: A view that shows the progress towards completion of a task.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a progress view for showing indeterminate progress, without a label.

items.name: init(label: () -> Label)
items.desc: Creates a progress view for showing indeterminate progress that displays a custom label.

items.name: init(LocalizedStringKey)
items.desc: Creates a progress view for showing indeterminate progress that generates its label from a localized string.

items.name: init<S>(S)
items.desc: Creates a progress view for showing indeterminate progress that generates its label from a string.

items.name: init(Progress)
items.desc: Creates a progress view for visualizing the given progress instance.

items.name: init<V>(value: V?, total: V)
items.desc: Creates a progress view for showing determinate progress.

items.name: init<V>(LocalizedStringKey, value: V?, total: V)
items.desc: Creates a progress view for showing determinate progress that generates its label from a localized string.

items.name: init<S, V>(S, value: V?, total: V)
items.desc: Creates a progress view for showing determinate progress that generates its label from a string.

items.name: init<V>(value: V?, total: V, label: () -> Label)
items.desc: Creates a progress view for showing determinate progress, with a custom label.

items.name: init<V>(value: V?, total: V, label: () -> Label, currentValueLabel: () -> CurrentValueLabel)
items.desc: Creates a progress view for showing determinate progress, with a custom label.

items.name: init(ProgressViewStyleConfiguration)
items.desc: Creates a progress view based on a style configuration.

items.name: struct ProgressViewStyleConfiguration
items.desc: The properties of a progress view instance.

items.name: func progressViewStyle<S>(S) -> some View
items.desc: Sets the style for progress views in this view.

items.name: protocol ProgressViewStyle
items.desc: A type that applies standard interaction behavior to all progress views within a view hierarchy.

items.name: var body: some View
items.desc: The content and behavior of the view.

items.name: typealias Body
items.desc: The type of view representing the body of this view.

declaration: struct ProgressView<Label, CurrentValueLabel> where Label : View, CurrentValueLabel : View
